description: [FIN7](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G0046) has utilized a variety of tools such as [Cobalt Strike](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0154), [PowerSploit](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0194), and the remote management tool, Atera for targeting efforts.(Citation: Mandiant FIN7 Apr 2022)

external_references.description: Abdo, B., et al. (2022, April 4). FIN7 Power Hour: Adversary Archaeology and the Evolution of FIN7. Retrieved April 5, 2022.
